eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Kalamazoo, MI; at 08:50 AM ON JAN 14, 2026 Effective until 05:05 PM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a test of the Emergency Alert System.  The broadcasters of your area, in cooperation with federal, state, and local authorities, have developed this system to keep you informed in the event of an emergency.  Had this been an actual emergency, official messages would have followed the alert tones you just heard.  This concludes this test of the Emergency Alert System.
